title: [SOLVED]820-3462 one of thunderbolt port not work
message:
Hi
I have this board 820-3462 the thunderbolt port near the magsafe board don't work.
I check some voltage:
PP3V3_SW_TBTAPWR pin 18 U9410 = 0V
PP3V3_S4_TBTAPWRSW = 3,3V
I compare the U9410 and U9610 in diode mode all pin, that all the same.
i think it's the VOUT failed on the U9410 but some component behind, is it possible another component?
thanks for your help.

title: [SOLVED]820-3462 one of thunderbolt port not work
message: You don't want to fix this......trust me.

title: [SOLVED]820-3462 one of thunderbolt port not work
message: why? i want to fix it, what is the problem?

title: [SOLVED]820-3462 one of thunderbolt port not work
message: OK. You want to replace the connector and risk messing up the working port too?

title: [SOLVED]820-3462 one of thunderbolt port not work
message:
No it's not the connector, it's in good state like the other, i think it's a problem with the interface (i haven't VOUT on the U9410) 
the VOUT is generate by U9410 not?
when i plug a thunderbolt gigabit, not detect on the system, the other port work well.

title: [SOLVED]820-3462 one of thunderbolt port not work
message: It can look good but in most non water damage cases it will be the issue. Too complex to mess with considering you have 1 working port. Again take my advice and don't mess with it.

title: [SOLVED]820-3462 one of thunderbolt port not work
[SOLVED]820-3462 one of thunderbolt port not work
message: Sorry but i fix it by change U9410 take on a dead board and now the 2 ports thunderbolt work well.
